Text: Andys counselAndy has hired David Gerger a lawyer wellknown to me and a former VE associate to be his lawyer advising him on criminal matters David called today to say that Andy was cooperating with Enron We talked briefly about who Andy should hire in the Houston civil cases Andys first choice is Kirkland Ellis I told David the name of several litigators there that I like and respect PS to Jim Ted Mirvis called back to say that he would be happy to take a reporters call about what an informal inquiry is CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You

FW New Enron Casefyi Original Message From Hampton Wallis Sent Wednesday October AM To Hampton Wallis Neumann Kim Cc Schwartz Charles Hendrick Max Dilg Joe Fletcher Scott Subject RE New Enron Case FYI this case is in federal court not state court Original Message From Hampton Wallis Sent Wednesday October AM To Neumann Kim Cc Schwartz Charles Hendrick Max Dilg Joe Fletcher Scott Subject New Enron Case Please get a copy of the petition in the following case which was filed yesterday in Harris County xmlnamespace prefix o ns urnschemasmicrosoftcomofficeoffice Pirelli Armstrong Tire Corporation Retiree Medical Benefits Trust et al v Kenneth Lay Robert Belfer Norman Blake and Enron Corporation et al Stockholder derivative action in which the defendants breached their fiduciary duties to Enron stockholders by renegotiating hedging agreements that favored LJM Partners to the detriment of the plaintiff James Baskin III Austin CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You

FW Enron Undertakingthis is a draft undertaking for all defendants who ask Enron to advance the expenses of litigation Please let me have any comments while there is no urgency for the defendants who are still associated with us I think we should send the undertaking to Andys lawyer ASAP Original Message From Hampton Wallis Sent Tuesday October AM To Schwartz Charles Subject Enron Undertaking CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You WPD WPD
